name: Subterror Nemesis Archer
effectText: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks an opponent's face-down Defense Position monster, and you control another "Subterror" monster: You can shuffle that opponent's monster into the Deck. If this card on the field is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Subterror" monster from your Deck in face-up or face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Subterror Nemesis Archer" once per turn.
